item.title: Learning Software Through Need
item.description: When I began my journey into software development, I only really wanted one thing. My goal was to create a mobile game. This was long before I had taken a single programming course, so I had no idea what I was doing. I searched for resources and decided to start learning Unity. The biggest thing in the way of my perfect mobile game was the fact that I didnâ€™t know how to code.
